CustomField.description: Content Libraries can only be shared to User IDs and Public Group IDs. This ID is a Public Group that represents the same membership of all the groups and roles shared to the original Document Folder.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Content Libraries can only be shared to User IDs and Public Group IDs. This ID is a Public Group that represents the same membership of all the groups and roles shared to the original Document Folder.
CustomField.label: Library Public Group ID
